data.title: The RBA and monetary policy: Ringwood Secondary College
data.meta_description: The Victorian Commercial Teachers Association is an independent organisation providing leadership, support services, programs and resources to educators.
data.text:
DATE: 29 May 2014 TIME: 4.00 - 5.00pm VENUE: Ringwood Secondary College ADDRESS: Bedford Road, Ringwood

Registration (Administration) Fee

$55 per school inc GST.

Teachers are welcome to attend when in the company of their students.

Places are limited.

Registrations will be processed in order of receipt of payment.

Recording of RBA presentations are not permitted under any circumstances

CANCELLATIONS: There will be no refunds should you cancel the registration

How to register:

Teachers must register on behalf of students

Log into VCTA's website and register below

Indicate the number of students attending - include the number of attending teachers in this figure (if attending)

Indicate any special or mobility needs of participants.

Upon completion of registration you will receive an invoice via email.

Participants are reminded that you need to login using your own username and password to register. Call VCTA Registrations on 03 9417 3555 if you require assistance.

Your registration is considered acceptance of VCTA's offer and as such, you are liable for the payment irrespective of your attendance.

Payment must be received by VCTA prior to the day of the program

Payment by Credit Card (VISA and Mastercard only) or by cheque. Money Order (payable to VCTA) mailed to: VCTA, PO Box 361, Abbotsford Vic 3067.
